control_value: General Directorate of Taxes and State Property (DGID)
ministry_of_economy: Ministry of Economy, Finance and Planning
decree_info: Company registered in accordance with decree n°2016-123 of August 09, 2016 on the creation and organization of the Trade and Movable Credit Register (RCCM).
ninea_explanation: The National Identification Number for Enterprises and Associations (NINEA) is assigned by the National Agency for Statistics and Demography (ANSD).
ninea_requirement: In accordance with Article 3 of Law n°2013-10 of December 28, 2013, any company operating in Senegal must have a NINEA.

gdpr_text: OMA DIGITAL is committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Senegalese Law n°2008-12 of January 25, 2008 on the protection of personal data.
cdp_address: Fahd Ben Abdel Aziz Building, Route de la Corniche Ouest, Dakar
disclaimer_text: OMA DIGITAL makes every effort to provide accurate and up-to-date information. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness or timeliness of the information published on this site.
external_links_text: Our site may contain links to external sites. OMA DIGITAL is not responsible for the content of these third-party sites.
jurisdiction: Any dispute relating to the use of this site is subject to Senegalese law. In case of dispute, the courts of Dakar shall have sole jurisdiction.
